name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
message: Welcome to the Computer Science Department. Our department is committed to providing quality education in the field of computer science and information technology.

name: Dr. Sunil Verma
message: The Mechanical Engineering Department focuses on practical skills and theoretical knowledge to prepare students for industry challenges.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
message: Our department is equipped with modern labs and experienced faculty to provide hands-on experience in electronics and telecommunication.

name: Dr. Amit Patel
message: The Electrical Engineering Department is dedicated to providing comprehensive education in electrical systems, power generation, and distribution.
